import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-modal', templateUrl: './modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./modal.component.css'] }) export class ModalComponent { closeModal : boolean = false; public closeModalWindow() { const dialog = document.querySelector("dialog")!; this.closeModal = !this.closeModal; if(this.closeModal) dialog.open = true; else dialog.open = false; } }
